com.viaoa.jfc

Class OAPlainDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.AbstractDocument
      • javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
        • com.viaoa.jfc.OAPlainDocument
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.text.Document

    public class OAPlainDocument
extends javax.swing.text.PlainDocument
    Used by OATextField and OATextArea, etc to customize/allow for specific inputs.
    See Also:
